page.title: 03PARISH COUNCIL
page.content: The Parish Council is made up of 6 elected members of the community & a secretary. It meets every month & the public may attend but not participate.The main function of the council is to maintain the smooth running of the village. It can register protest against bad planning, inadequate care of roads & footpaths,reckless cutting down of trees, but it has no authority to enforce improvements. This must come from the Test valley District Council. The Parish Council has recently approved the planting of trees round the playing field. It has saved a valuable woodland area from being felled. Every year it is allocated Â£1500 from the Borough for improvements in the village.
